pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action

Interface ActionParameterExtractor<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlainObjectParameterExtractor, UserContextExtractor, UserDetailsParameterExtractor

    public interface ActionParameterExtractor<T>
    In addition to custom value serializers, action controller uses parameter extractors for resolving action parameters that canâ€™t be resolved using serialization engine. Similar to exception handlers, the most suitable parameter extractor is chosen for each parameter at server start. T means the most generic parameter type that can be extracted by the implementation. This can be tricky because if the extractor handles parameters of type A and the particular action method parameter is of type B extends A, that extractor will be invoked to resolve parameter and it must return object of B type, otherwise ClassCastException will be thrown. To recognise type of the parameter, fromTextContent() method contains ActionParameterInformation parameter, which provides information about currently extracted action parameter.

    Created on: 2011-07-14 15:11:28

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T fromTextContent(String text, ActionParameterInformation parameterInformation, ActionExecutionContext context)
      Retrieves action parameters using text sent by client, action parameter information and context of the currently executed action.
      boolean isDeserializationRequired()
      This flag indicates whether SerializationResolver implementation will be used to retrieve serialization information of processed parameter type.

    • Method Detail

      • fromTextContent

        T fromTextContent(String text,
                ActionParameterInformation parameterInformation,
                ActionExecutionContext context)
                  throws Exception
        Retrieves action parameters using text sent by client, action parameter information and context of the currently executed action.
        Parameters:
        text - serialized version of the currently processed parameter.
        parameterInformation - meta information about currently processed parameter.
        context - action execution context. If isDeserializationRequired() returns true, serialization of that parameter is resolved using SerializationResolver.
        Returns:
        resolved parameter.
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if any problem occurs.

      • isDeserializationRequired

        boolean isDeserializationRequired()
        This flag indicates whether SerializationResolver implementation will be used to retrieve serialization information of processed parameter type. In case when serialization resolver is used, serialization information is stored in ActionParameterInformation object.
        Returns:
        true if serialization resolver must be used, false otherwise.
